annotation, the parameter usually has the type **Optional[T]**, the returned type will have the type **T**really not worth a package, just dont know where else to put it... code-block:: python # definition from typing import TypeVar, Optional T = TypeVar('T') def get_default_if_none(parameter: Optional[T], default: T) -> T: if parameter is None: return default else: return parameter.. code-block:: python # usage from typing import Optional import lib_parameter x: Optional[int] = None x = lib_parameter.get_default_if_none(x, default=1) # now x is from type int, not
